scripts.clean: find 'web/assets/js' 'web/assets/css' -type f -not -name '.gitkeep' | xargs rm -rf && rm -rf web/assets/cached_uglify
scripts.dev:html: export NODE_ENV=development npm_config_host npm_config_port && set ${npm_config_host=localhost} ${npm_config_port=8007} && nodemon --watch web --ext html server.dev.js
scripts.dev:php:server: export NODE_ENV=development npm_config_php=true npm_config_host npm_config_port && set ${npm_config_host=localhost} ${npm_config_port=8007} && php -S $npm_config_host:$npm_config_port -t web
scripts.dev:php:assets: export NODE_ENV=development npm_config_php=true npm_config_host npm_config_port && set ${npm_config_host=localhost} ${npm_config_port=8007} && nodemon --watch web --ext php server.dev.js
scripts.view:html: export NODE_ENV=production npm_config_php=false npm_config_host npm_config_port && set ${npm_config_host=localhost} ${npm_config_port=8007} && npm run build && node server.dev.js
scripts.view:php: export NODE_ENV=production npm_config_php=true npm_config_host npm_config_port && set ${npm_config_host=localhost} ${npm_config_port=8007} && npm run build && php -S $npm_config_host:$npm_config_port -t web
